content: i like to wear animal-themed hats for halloween and this year i just had to be a chicken i modified the pattern from knittwittz for a simple earflap beanie link text 1 and designed the chicken-parts and added them on this is my first pattern so i hope it makes sense i ve benefited so much from the free patterns on ravelry so i thought i d try to give back a little cluck cluck most of the pattern is done in half-double_crochet us with a g-h hook with worsted weight yarn i don t think gauge is very important for this i just made sure to use the smaller hook for the parts that required stuffing so it wouldn t show through 1 http //www ravelry com/patterns/library/simple-earflap-hat
